titleStmt.title: An exhortation to peace: with an intimation of the prime enemies thereof, lately delivered in a sermon, and newly published with some small addition, by Lionell Gatford, B.D. rector of Dinnington in Suffolke, now a prisoner in Ely-house in Holborne.
titleStmt.author: Gatford, Lionel, d. 1665.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 3 in the imprint date is crossed out; "1642 March. 24".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
